update.description:
SVG transforms will come in a different PR

There's a test.
/build/gazebo/common/UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST

Alternativerly, you can CTRL-M (model editor) and add an svg file (look in /test/data/svg) and extrude a 3D link from a 2d shape.
update.title: SVG support for arcs, disjoints paths and their triangulation / extrusion

content.raw:
Indeed, it looks like 5b26ae4 will fix the warning.

There were three tests that failed in both jenkins builds:

~~~
INTEGRATION_polyline.test_ran
MeshManager.CreateExtrudedPolyline
UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST.test_ran
~~~
content.html:
Indeed, it looks like 5b26ae4 will fix the warning.

There were three tests that failed in both jenkins builds:

INTEGRATION_polyline.test_ran
MeshManager.CreateExtrudedPolyline
UNIT_SVGLoader_TEST.test_ran

content.raw:
The [first jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/85) shows some failed tests and a compiler warning.

I just started a [new one](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/88/) since new commits have been added since then.
content.html:
The first jenkins job shows some failed tests and a compiler warning.

I just started a new one since new commits have been added since then.

pullrequest.title: SVG support for arcs, disjoints paths and their triangulation / extrusion

content.raw:
the call to `DelaunayTriangulation` must be in a check, otherwise the code will not compile (without GTS).
I added the other one to avoid any computation when GTS is not present... I'm not sure if I made things any better
content.html: the call to DelaunayTriangulation must be in a check, otherwise the code will not compile (without GTS). I added the other one to avoid any computation when GTS is not present... I'm not sure if I made things any better
